8.title: Grown Daughter and Son of Bhagya Lakshmi and Rudra Prataph
8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: The story explores relationships in the families of siblings Krishna Prasad (Jackie) and Krishna Priya (Meena Kumari). The sister gives up her son to her sister-in-law and, in exchange, raises her niece. When the mother and the daughter end up being mother-in-law and daughter-in-law in the same house, their lives change.
imdb.title: Raktha Sambandham
plot: The story explores relationships in the families of siblings Krishna Prasad (Jackie) and Krishna Priya (Meena Kumari). The sister gives up her son to her sister-in-law and, in exchange, raises her niece. When the mother and the daughter end up being mother-in-law and daughter-in-law in the same house, their lives change.
